column2: when the security camera detects a new person , send a picture to my email .

column2: when a file changes in my google drive , send an email to aaron with subject change .

column2: set the temperature to NUMBER_0 degrees when it 's a us holiday .

column2: post a random cat picture on my facebook .

column2: when i leave my work office , turn on my air conditioner in the house .

column2: when the temperature in the room is higher than NUMBER_0 , turn on the air conditioning in the house .
column3: edge ( monitor ( @thermostat.get_temperature ) ) on param:value:Measure(C) >= NUMBER_0 unit:F => @thermostat.set_hvac_mode param:mode:Enum(heat,cool,heat_cool,off) = enum:cool

column3: edge ( monitor ( @thermostat.get_temperature ) ) on param:value:Measure(C) >= NUMBER_0 unit:F => @thermostat.set_hvac_mode param:mode:Enum(heat,cool,heat_cool,off) = enum:off

column2: dial 911 if a dangerous asteroid is nearby .

column2: turn on the ac if the temperature gets above NUMBER_0 degrees .

column3: edge ( monitor ( @org.thingpedia.weather.current param:location:Location = LOCATION_0 ) ) on param:temperature:Measure(C) <= 0 unit:C => @com.gmail.send_email

column2: post my instagram posts to my twitter account each time .
column3: monitor ( @com.instagram.get_pictures ) => @com.twitter.post_picture on param:picture_url:Entity(tt:picture) = param:picture_url:Entity(tt:picture)

column2: when i reach home , make the living room camera stop recording
column3: edge ( monitor ( @org.thingpedia.builtin.thingengine.phone.get_gps ) ) on param:location:Location == location:home => @security-camera.set_power param:power:Enum(on,off) = enum:off

column2: when i get to the office , please turn on the lights .
column3: edge ( monitor ( @org.thingpedia.builtin.thingengine.phone.get_gps ) ) on param:location:Location == location:work => @light-bulb.set_power param:power:Enum(on,off) = enum:on

column2: when i leave home , please turn off the lights .
column3: edge ( monitor ( @org.thingpedia.builtin.thingengine.phone.get_gps ) ) on not param:location:Location == location:home => @light-bulb.set_power param:power:Enum(on,off) = enum:off

column2: when i leave work , please remember to turn off the air conditioner .
column3: edge ( monitor ( @org.thingpedia.builtin.thingengine.phone.get_gps ) ) on not param:location:Location == location:work => @thermostat.set_hvac_mode param:mode:Enum(heat,cool,heat_cool,off) = enum:off

column2: post all new instagram photos with the hashtag universityofsevilla to my onedrive folder
column3: monitor ( ( @com.instagram.get_pictures ) filter param:hashtags:Array(Entity(tt:hashtag)) contains " universityofsevilla " ^^tt:hashtag ) => @com.live.onedrive.upload_picture param:file_name:Entity(tt:path_name) = " universityofsevilla " on param:picture_url:Entity(tt:picture) = param:picture_url:Entity(tt:picture)

column2: when i get home from work turn the temperature in the house to NUMBER_0 degrees
column3: edge ( monitor ( @org.thingpedia.builtin.thingengine.phone.get_gps ) ) on param:location:Location == location:home => @thermostat.set_target_temperature param:value:Measure(C) = NUMBER_0 unit:F

column2: call mom when i get an email from dad
column3: monitor ( ( @com.gmail.inbox ) filter param:sender_address:Entity(tt:email_address) == " dad " ^^tt:username ) on new param:email_id:Entity(com.gmail:email_id) => @org.thingpedia.builtin.thingengine.phone.call param:number:Entity(tt:phone_number) = " mom " ^^tt:username

column2: send a message to natalie when i get to LOCATION_0
column3: edge ( monitor ( @org.thingpedia.builtin.thingengine.phone.get_gps ) ) on param:location:Location == LOCATION_0 => @org.thingpedia.builtin.thingengine.phone.send_sms param:to:Entity(tt:phone_number) = " natalie " ^^tt:username

column2: turn off the air conditioner when it gets colder than NUMBER_0 degrees in the room .
column3: edge ( monitor ( @thermostat.get_temperature ) ) on param:value:Measure(C) <= NUMBER_0 unit:F => @thermostat.set_hvac_mode param:mode:Enum(heat,cool,heat_cool,off) = enum:off

column2: turn on the heater when it gets colder than NUMBER_0 degrees in the room .
column3: edge ( monitor ( @thermostat.get_temperature ) ) on param:value:Measure(C) <= NUMBER_0 unit:F => @thermostat.set_hvac_mode param:mode:Enum(heat,cool,heat_cool,off) = enum:heat

column2: when i leave , turn off all of the lights
column3: edge ( monitor ( @org.thingpedia.builtin.thingengine.phone.get_gps ) ) on not param:location:Location == location:current_location => @light-bulb.set_power param:power:Enum(on,off) = enum:off

column2: when i arrive home , turn on the heater
column3: edge ( monitor ( @org.thingpedia.builtin.thingengine.phone.get_gps ) ) on param:location:Location == location:home => @thermostat.set_hvac_mode param:mode:Enum(heat,cool,heat_cool,off) = enum:heat

column2: when an event on my calendar at elementary school ends upload a picture to facebook .
column3: edge ( monitor ( ( @org.thingpedia.icalendar.list_events ) filter param:location:String == " elementary school " ) ) on param:status:Enum(scheduled,upcoming,started,ended) == enum:ended => @com.facebook.post_picture
column4: edge ( monitor ( ( @org.thingpedia.icalendar.list_events ) filter param:location =~ " elementary school " ) ) on param:status == enum:ended => @com.facebook.post_picture

column2: when the fitbit updates , get the steps i have taken .
column3: ( monitor ( @com.fitbit.getsteps ) ) => ( @com.fitbit.getsteps ) => notify

column2: when it is time for my appointment , mute the volume of my lg tv .
column3: edge ( monitor ( @org.thingpedia.icalendar.list_events ) ) on param:status:Enum(scheduled,upcoming,started,ended) == enum:started => @com.lg.tv.webos2.mute

column2: when an asteroid is closer than NUMBER_0 miles sms me
column3: edge ( monitor ( @gov.nasa.asteroid ) ) on param:distance:Measure(m) <= NUMBER_0 unit:mi => @org.thingpedia.builtin.thingengine.phone.send_sms

column2: when it 's a holiday in indonesia send an email with subject selamat
column3: monitor ( ( @org.thingpedia.holidays.get_holidays param:country:Entity(tt:country) = " indonesia " ^^tt:country ) filter param:date:Date >= start_of unit:day and param:date:Date <= end_of unit:day ) => @com.gmail.send_email param:subject:String = " selamat "

column2: when i receive an important email phone PHONE_NUMBER_0
column3: monitor ( @com.gmail.inbox param:is_important:Boolean = true ) on new param:email_id:Entity(com.gmail:email_id) => @org.thingpedia.builtin.thingengine.phone.call param:number:Entity(tt:phone_number) = PHONE_NUMBER_0

column2: when the temperature on my thermostat becomes greater than NUMBER_0 turn the air conditioning on in the thermostat
column3: edge ( monitor ( @thermostat.get_temperature ) ) on param:value:Measure(C) >= NUMBER_0 unit:F => @thermostat.set_hvac_mode param:mode:Enum(heat,cool,heat_cool,off) = enum:cool

column2: when the temperature on my thermostat becomes greater than NUMBER_0 shut down the heating
column3: edge ( monitor ( @thermostat.get_temperature ) ) on param:value:Measure(C) >= NUMBER_0 unit:F => @thermostat.set_hvac_mode param:mode:Enum(heat,cool,heat_cool,off) = enum:off

column2: when i am heavier than NUMBER_0 make note of my weight on fitbit
column3: edge ( monitor ( @com.fitbit.getbody ) ) on param:weight >= NUMBER_0 unit:lb => @com.fitbit.recordweight

column2: when i receive an email marked as important get important emails
column3: ( monitor ( @com.gmail.inbox param:is_important:Boolean = true ) on new param:email_id:Entity(com.gmail:email_id) ) => ( @com.gmail.inbox param:is_important:Boolean = true ) => notify

column2: when an asteroid passes close to earth get today 's asteroid
column3: ( monitor ( @gov.nasa.asteroid ) ) => ( @gov.nasa.asteroid ) => notify

column2: do set my thermostat to NUMBER_0 when the temperature in the room falls below NUMBER_1 .
column3: edge ( monitor ( @thermostat.get_temperature ) ) on param:value <= NUMBER_1 unit:F => @thermostat.set_target_temperature param:value = NUMBER_0 unit:F

column2: keep track of my weight on days when i walk over NUMBER_0 steps .
column3: edge ( monitor ( @com.fitbit.getsteps ) ) on param:steps:Number >= NUMBER_0 => @com.fitbit.recordweight

column2: when my mom text my phone could you call her number .
column3: monitor ( ( @org.thingpedia.builtin.thingengine.phone.sms ) filter param:sender:Entity(tt:phone_number) == " mom " ^^tt:username ) => @org.thingpedia.builtin.thingengine.phone.call on param:number:Entity(tt:phone_number) = param:sender:Entity(tt:phone_number)

column2: when i get something in my gmail play me a song on my speaker
column3: monitor ( @com.gmail.inbox ) on new param:email_id:Entity(com.gmail:email_id) => @org.thingpedia.bluetooth.speaker.a2dp.play_music

column2: when the temperature goes above NUMBER_0 degrees in here cut the heat off
column3: edge ( monitor ( @org.thingpedia.weather.current param:location = location:current_location ) ) on param:temperature >= NUMBER_0 unit:F => @thermostat.set_hvac_mode param:mode:Enum(heat,cool,heat_cool,off) = enum:off

column2: if an asteroid comes close to the earth get me today 's asteroid info from nasa
column3: ( monitor ( @gov.nasa.asteroid ) ) => ( @gov.nasa.asteroid ) => notify

column2: when a time changes on icalendar send an email to my assistant natalie
column3: monitor ( @org.thingpedia.icalendar.list_events ) on new [ param:start_date:Date , param:end_date:Date ] => @com.gmail.send_email param:to:Entity(tt:email_address) = " natalie " ^^tt:username
